Details.Name: Grocery
Details.Feature: 3% or 8% rebate at Cold Storage, Market Place, Jasons, Giant and Guardian (in SMRT$) with min. spend of $400/month or $800/month
10% Off House Brands at Cold Storage, Giant and Guardian
Up to 3% rebate on contactless payments and recurring bills
Free home delivery at Giant IMM, Parkway, Tampines, VivoCity with S$150 min. spend in a single receipt

Details.Name: Petrol
Details.Feature: Up to 14% Petrol Discount + 2% rebate at Caltex
Up to 20% Petrol Discount at SPC (10% SPC&U Card discount + 5% UOB Card + $3 off every $51 nett spend (5%))

Details.Name: Shopping
Details.Feature: Up to 20% SMART$ rebate at over participating outlets islandwide including Adeva Spa, O.P.I., Hard Rock Cafe, EpiCentre, Cathay Cineplexes, Tissot, AirAsia and many more
